alert.note: Alert for Grand Traverse; Leelanau (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 6:21PM EDT until June 25 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Leelanau County in northern Michigan... North central Grand Traverse County in northern Michigan... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 621 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Glen Arbor to near Elk Rapids, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Traverse City, Leland, Empire, Grand Traverse Light, Sleeping Bear Point, Bingham, Glen Arbor, Suttons Bay, Northport, Cedar, Greilickville, Lake Leelanau, Mapleton, Burdickville, Maple City, Glen Haven, Old Mission, Omena, Peshawbestown and Leelanau State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
